1064710.name: Wrath of the Samurai
1064710.description:
Wrath of the Samurai is a made for VR strategy hack and slash game that takes inspiration from old hack and slash titles and implements them into virtual reality, you are a Ronin samurai pitted against thousands of enemies.
Slash your way to victory with sword, shuriken or bow and rack up as many kills as you can for bigger rewards!
Wrath of the Samurai has a campaign mode as well as an arena mode for those who just want to kill as much as possible as quickly as possible, with realistic sword physics you are in full control of your actions.

Wrath of the Samurai is currently on prolonged hiatus due to lack of interest from players, my hard drive containing all the game files was destroyed in a freak accident, It will be reborn in the form of a new and better game in the future, for now it is what it is and will be revived at a much later date, for now enjoy the cheap price for the cheap game.
1064710.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
